name: Goon Moon
description: '''Goon Moon''' is an American rock band composed of Jeordie White (also known as [[Twiggy Ramirez]]) and [[Chris Goss]]. The band released the mini-LP ''[[I Got a Brand New Egg Layin' Machine]]'' in 2005 and have since recorded a full-length album, ''[[Licker's Last Leg]]'', which was released on May 8, 2007. The album features cameos from longtime Goss collaborators [[Josh Homme]] and [[Josh Freese]], as well as [[Palm Desert Scene|desert rock]] mainstay [[Dave Catching]].
